TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Gongxidaye, title = Gongxidaye, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gongxidaye} }

S.FORM: Gongxidaye(u kamu nu Lipun: Gongxidaye, 1956 a mihcaan－) i Lipun jing gang xian qing shui ding lecuhen u misakulitay a kulit tu cudad a tatama. kaliliman i Lipun mamin micudad tu talawkaway a cacudadan, Gongxidaye mamusakawaw tu sikulitay a misangaay tu kulit,u nu tademaw a kulit a kawaw nida. sisa Gongxidaye malinga tu tu pasayni nu wawaan a kuit misanga, mamin sa 1999 a mihcaan wucu nu buyu i kilakilangan makaadih tu adidiay a kiwma nu kungku "kapah ayda sakapahay a nikalalitemuh" kyu makaala tu tuluway a sakasengan a kawlah nu kulit. 2003 a mihcaan Gongxidaye yadah kuni papeluwan tu konglong a sasakamuwan "u nu konglong a kulit tayamin" , tu nu sayaway "adihen mayda asu'ay"sisa 2010 a mihcaan misumat tu misaungaay a kacudu; u luma a mihcaan tu cacay a bataan a bulad i nakulikulitan i Toykui a tilibi "Gongxidaye pakaluwaluwah adihen mayda asu'ay"(Gongxidaye pakaluwaluwahおまえうまそうだな) a adihan, misanga tu misaungaay a tilibi paadih. 2015 a mihcaan tu waluay a bulad"u sakasaetimen naku a wawa kisu"makaycu tu mala kacudu misaungaay inga. matatulin kina kawaw nida mikulit tu cudad, Gongxidaye misanga tu nu wawa a sapasubana tu sikulitay a cudad,sawni nisulit; atu nu Lipun a sipakungku i tatacuwacuwa. nilacul namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan wikipayke-宮西達也 nasulitan ni Lisin Kubung i 2019 itiza Sakul niyazu'

Gongxidaye(o kamo no Lipon: Gongxidaye, 1956 a mihcaan－) i Lipon jing gang xian qing shoi ding lecohen o misakolitay a kolit to codad a tatama. kaliliman i Lipon mamin micodad to talawkaway a cacodadan, Gongxidaye mamosakawaw to sikolitay a misangaay to kolit,o no tademaw a kolit a kawaw nida. sisa Gongxidaye malinga to to pasayni no wawaan a koit misanga, mamin sa 1999 a mihcaan woco no boyo i kilakilangan makaadih to adidiay a kiwma no kongko "kapah ayda sakapahay a nikalalitemoh" kyo makaala to toloway a sakasengan a kawlah no kolit. 2003 a mihcaan Gongxidaye yadah koni papelowan to konglong a sasakamowan "o no konglong a kolit tayamin" , to no sayaway "adihen mayda aso'ay"sisa 2010 a mihcaan misomat to misaongaay a kacodo; o loma a mihcaan to cacay a bataan a bolad i nakolikolitan i Toykoi a tilibi "Gongxidaye pakalowalowah adihen mayda aso'ay"(Gongxidaye pakalowalowahおまえうまそうだな) a adihan, misanga to misaongaay a tilibi paadih. 2015 a mihcaan to waloay a bolad"o sakasaetimen nako a wawa kiso"makayco to mala kacodo misaongaay inga. matatolin kina kawaw nida mikolit to codad, Gongxidaye misanga to no wawa a sapasobana to sikolitay a codad,sawni nisolit; ato no Lipon a sipakongko i tatacowacowa. nilacol namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan wikipayke-宮西達也 nasolitan ni Lisin Kobong i 2019 itiza Sakol niyazo'
